# Centralized secrets management without the chaos
Securely manage, orchestrate, and govern your secrets and non-human identities at scale with Doppler’s cloud platform—integrated with your favorite DevOps tools for secure workflows.
[Start for Free](https://doppler.com/<https:/dashboard.doppler.com/register>)

Doppler is an innovative technology company founded in 2018, part of Y Combinator Batch W19. Its mission? To be the first SecretOps platform, making secrets management intuitive and secure for developers. With a team of 25 employees, Doppler offers a centralized solution for managing, orchestrating, and governing sensitive information and non-human identities at scale. It's like a safety net for your data, no matter what tech stack you're juggling.

Their website, [doppler.com](https://doppler.com), showcases how they empower businesses to seamlessly integrate their solution with popular CI/CD tools and frameworks, enhancing security throughout the development workflow. What’s particularly cool is their user-based pricing—pay only for what you need, making it accessible to teams of all sizes without extra charges for machine identities.

Doppler also emphasizes compliance and security: they've been SOC 2 verified, which is increasingly critical in today’s data-driven world. Plus, they're helping to tackle the staggering statistic that 49% of breaches involve credentials, an issue they've addressed head-on.

With over 30 billion secrets read monthly, Doppler is trusted by more than 47,000 organizations, proving its effectiveness and reliability in the realm of DevOps and security. They also continuously provide educational resources, tools, and reports (like their insightful analysis in the [Gartner® Report on Secrets Management Tools](https://doppler.com/<https:/www.doppler.com/gartner-report-secrets-management-tools?ungated=true>)) to keep users informed about best practices in security.

If you’re looking to secure your secrets without the chaos, Doppler's platform might just be what you need. Give it a look and see how it can streamline your secret management and enhance your security posture.
